functions.name: devops_repository_no_embedded_credentials

functions.description: Checks if pipeline project environment log is enabled.

functions.description: Checks if pipeline project environment log option is enabled.

functions.description: Checks if pipeline project artifacts encryption is enabled.

functions.description: Checks if project has no plaintext credentials.

functions.description: Checks if pipelines deployment stage limit is set.

functions.description: Checks if pipelines single deployment limit is set.

functions.name: devops_security_testing_implementation
functions.description: Checks if security testing is implemented in DevOps.

notes: All functions are based on Azure DevOps API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
